name: useDebounceCallback
description: Custom hook that creates a debounced version of a callback function.

props.name: func
props.description: The callback function to be debounced.

props.name: delay
props.description: The delay in milliseconds before the callback is invoked (default is `500` milliseconds).

props.name: options
props.description: Options to control the behavior of the debounced function.

schema.name: leading
schema.description: Determines whether the function should be invoked on the leading edge of the timeout.

schema.name: maxWait
schema.description: The maximum time the specified function is allowed to be delayed before it is invoked.

schema.name: trailing
schema.description: Determines whether the function should be invoked on the trailing edge of the timeout.
